pageProduct.name: Alkira Refine Pore Refining Facial Scrub 125ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

For an instantly fresher, brighter face. With the perfect ratio of super gentle volcanic scrub spheres and a potent antibacterial and antioxidant Australian botanical complex of Emu Apple, Tasmanian Blue Gum, Lemon and Aniseed Myrtle to transform dull, problematic skin

Warnings

Avoid contact with eyes. If irritation occurs, rinse immediately and discontinue use. We recommend patch testing. For external use only.

Common Uses

Key Benefits: • Antibacterial and anti-inflammatory rich Australian native complex of Tasmanian Blue Gum and Lemon and Aniseed Myrtle to balance blemish prone skin • Contains Willow Bark, a pore minimising, uneven skin tone correcting and antiinflammatory • Super gentle volcanic lava spheres to help unclog pores • Skin softening and calming Coconut, Jojoba and Cucumber

Ingredients

Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Pumice, Cetearyl Alcohol, Cetyl Alcohol, Ceteareth-20, Glycerin, Sesamum Indicum (Sesame) Seed Oil, Rosa Canina (Rosehip) Fruit Oil, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Citrus Aurantifolia (Key Lime) Oil, Backhousia Citriodora (Lemon Myrtle) Leaf Oil, Citrus Nobilis (Mandarin Orange) Peel Oil, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil, Citrus Aurantium Amara (Bitter Orange) Leaf/Twig Oil, Moringa Oleifera Seed Oil, Kunzea Pomifera (Emu Apple) Fruit Extract, Aspalathus Linearis (Rooibos) Leaf Extract, Eucalyptus Globulus (Tasmanian Blue Gum) Leaf Extract, Punica Granatum (Pomegranate) Fruit Extract, Vaccinium Myrtillus (Bilberry) Fruit Extract, Cucumis Sativa (Cucumber) Extract, Salix Alba (Willow) Bark Extract, Glycyrrhiza Glabra (Licorice) Root Extract, Tasmannia Lanceolata (Pepper) Fruit Extract, Backhousia Anisata (Aniseed Myrtle) Leaf Extract, Acacia Melanoxylon (Blackwood) Leaf Extract, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Water, Water (Aqua), Charcoal Powder, Tocopherol (vitamin E), Xanthan Gum, Citric Acid, Sodium Citrate, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Phenoxyethanol, Benzyl Alcohol, Linalool*Limonene* Citral* * Allergens

Directions

Gently massage onto damp skin using circular motions. Rinse with warm water and pat dry. Avoid contact with eyes. Use 1-2 times weekly or often as required.
